ggsci: Scientific Journal and Sci-Fi Themed Color Palettes for 'ggplot2'

Source: R/ggsci-package.R
ggsci-package.Rd

A collection of 'ggplot2' color palettes inspired by plots in scientific journals, data visualization libraries, science fiction movies, and TV shows.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://nanx.me/ggsci/

  • https://github.com/nanxstats/ggsci

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/nanxstats/ggsci/issues
